original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽22.8. Kusalattika, Mahantaraduka🔽Nakusalaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusalattika mahantaraduka  na kusalam na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Triad of the Wholesome, the Great Decad🔽With an unwholesome object and with a neutral object as condition there arises a neutral consciousness element. (Abbreviated.)

as condition, three … With a great and small object as condition, three … With a not great or small object as condition, three … With a fine object as condition, three … With a gross object as condition, three … With a fine and gross object as condition, three … With a not fine or gross object as condition, three … With a subtle object as condition, three … With an exalted object as a condition that is not a decisive support, three … With a condition that is a decisive support, three … With a condition that is not a decisive support and is also not a decisive support, three … condition that is a faculty and is also a faculty, three … With a condition that is a faculty and is also not a faculty, three … With a condition that is not a faculty and is also not a faculty, three … With a condition that is a power and is also a power, three … With a condition that is a power and is also not a power, three … With a condition that is not a power and is also not a power, three …
